desc: Manuka Baby, the eco-friendly way to support your baby's safe sleep even when co-sleeping. Manuka Baby is kiwi-designed, eco friendly and built to last.

layout.text: The eco-friendly way to support your baby's safe sleep

It is highly recommended by health ministries and related health organisations that newborn babies are placed in their own safe sleep space for the first 3-6 months of life - basically, until they start rolling. Manuka Baby Beds provide that safe sleep space in a practical, affordable and environmentally friendly way. 
Manuka Baby Beds are New Zealand designed, high quality bamboo newborn beds that also replace the need for bassinets or port-a-cots.
